mapper.select: select * from documentinfo as t where t.author_id like concat(#{id},';%') or t.author_id like concat('%;',#{id},';%')

select t.author_id,t.author_name,t.affiliation,COUNT(m.author_id) AS paperCount,SUM(citing_count) AS citation from authorinfo AS t,documentinfo AS m where t.author_id = #{id} AND (m.author_id LIKE CONCAT(#{id},';%') OR m.author_id LIKE CONCAT('%;',#{id},';%'))
select group_concat(terms separator '') as topics from documentinfo as t where t.author_id like concat(#{id},';%') or t.author_id like concat('%;',#{id},';%')

select t.author_id,t.author_name,t.affiliation,COUNT(t.author_id) AS paperCount,SUM(citing_count) AS citation from (SELECT * from authorinfo where author_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) t JOIN documentinfo AS m on (m.author_id LIKE CONCAT(t.author_id,';%') OR m.author_id LIKE CONCAT('%;',t.author_id,';%')) GROUP BY t.author_id
